description: Gotta read 'em all!Want to know inside stats and battling strengths for all the new Pokemon in the Shinnoh Region? Check out this full guide to all the characters of the all-new Pokemon series! Featuring exclusive tips, plus all the Pokedex info you can handle, this handbook will answer all your questions and help sharpen your skills.
author: Tracey West
